values: 取悦；使愉快；使愉悦；让人高兴；满足；使满意；迎合；讨好；符合（某人的）喜好；使受欢迎
（用于客气地请求）请；拜托；（用于加强请求的语气）请务必；（用于接受别人的好意）行；求你了；别这样

sample.mean: adj. 使人快乐的；让人开心的；令人愉快的；让人满意的；讨人喜欢的；友好的；体贴的
n. 高兴；愉快；快乐；满足；乐趣；快感；乐事；惬意；消遣；娱乐

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 令人愉快的，舒适的；讨人喜欢的，和蔼可亲的
高兴的；喜欢的；乐意做某事
满意；愿意（please的过去分词形式）
令人愉快的；讨人喜欢的；合意的
快乐；希望；娱乐；令人高兴的事

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指使人通过注意某些有趣或悦人的事物而消遣，着重使人愉快的效果。
多指愿望、兴趣得到满足后产生的强烈满意情绪。
普通用词，指出于任何原因使人兴奋或对某事物保持好奇心或注意力，侧重引起兴趣或注意。
指通过给他人快乐感的消遣活动，使自己或他人从单调中解脱出来。

word_group.brief_definition: (表示殷切期望)但愿老天帮忙, 上帝保佑
(表示恼怒和不关心)随你的便, 悉听尊便

word_group.phrase: will the real - please stand up

word_group.brief_definition: （表示委婉的请求）您能…吗？；请您…；您能否…
请参阅附；请查看附件；请见随附

bilingual.source: Yes, please, and pass me the knife and fork please.

list.abstract: please，英文单词，意思是使高兴，使喜欢，使满意，合...的心意，是...的意愿。
please，英语单词，及物动词、不及物动词、感叹词，作及物动词时意为“使喜欢；使高兴，使满意”，作不及物动词时意为“讨人喜欢；令人高兴”，作感叹词时意为“请（礼貌用语）”。

yingyinNormal.en: Majesty, please! Kill me! Please!
yingyinNormal.zh: 陛下，请杀了我吧！求求你！

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, lady. Please, please take him too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小姐，你别闹了。请你把他也带走。

yingyinNormal.en: No. No, you can't. Stop! Please don't go away. Please?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不不，你不能走，停下来！请别走，求你。

yingyinNormal.en: This way, if you please, ladies.
yingyinNormal.zh: 女士们，请走这边。

yingyinNormal.en: Please don't think us too forward.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请原谅我们的唐突。

yingyinNormal.en: May I please have everyone's attention?
yingyinNormal.zh: 请各位看这里？

yingyinNormal.en: My colleague here forgot to say please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的兄弟刚才忘记对你说请了。

yingyinNormal.en: Go home. Merlin, send in Roxy, please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 回家吧。梅林，请洛克希进来吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Just double-check your seat belts, please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请再次检查安全带是否系好。

yingyinNormal.en: Never mind. Just, please go talk to him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没关系，只是请你去和他谈谈。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, Bernadette, please play my clarinet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，伯纳黛特，请给我吹箫吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Please, promise me that you'll tell her that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请保证你们一定会转告她。

yingyinNormal.en: You sure, sweetie? Please, continue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你确定吗，亲爱的？拜托，请继续。好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: So, would you please hand over the camera?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以现在可以请你把相机给我们吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Lawrence, please, don't patronize me. Listen...
yingyinNormal.zh: 劳伦斯，请不要敷衍我，听着…

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks for your consideration. now please leave.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢你的照顾，现在请你离开。

yingyinNormal.en: May I buy you a beverage? Tepid water, please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 能请你喝杯饮料吗？温水，谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: Please hold all questions till the end of the presentation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请等演讲结束后再提问。

yingyinNormal.en: Please, Anduin. Medivh is the Guardian.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请不要这样，安度因，麦迪文是守护者...

yingyinNormal.en: Please tell me you got the message. What message?
yingyinNormal.zh: 请告诉我你有收到留言。什么留言？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 使人不愉快的；讨厌的；粗鲁的；不友好的；不体谅的
adj. 使人快乐的；让人开心的；令人愉快的；让人满意的；讨人喜欢的；友好的；体贴的
adj. 高兴的；欣喜的；喜欢的；满意的；开心的；乐意的；洋洋自得的；自满的
adj. 令人高兴的；使人快乐的；使人满意的；舒适的
n. 恼怒；不赞成
n. 高兴；愉快；快乐；满足；乐趣；快感；乐事；惬意；消遣；娱乐

word_family.mean: v. 使高兴；使喜欢；使满足；随自己的意；自己想干什么就干什么；讨人喜欢；满足心愿；给人美的愉悦；希望做某事；想做某事

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Please</highlight> give reasons for your recommendation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请给出你推荐的理由。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Please</highlight> don't approach me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请不要靠近我。

examination_example.sentence: Dare to be different, <highlight>please</highlight> don't smoke!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 敢于与众不同，请不要吸烟！

examination_example.sentence: It is the prize-givers' money to do with as they <highlight>please</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是获奖者的钱，他们可以随意使用。

examination_example.sentence: Men make their own history, but they do not make it just as they <highlight>please</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类创造了自己的历史，但他们并不随心所欲。

sense_info_list.en: cause to feel happy and satisfied

examination_example.sentence: Students are treated like customers to be <highlight>pleased</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生被当作顾客来取悦。

examination_example.sentence: Be easily <highlight>pleased</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很容易高兴。

n. 高兴；愉快；快乐；满足；乐趣；快感；乐事；惬意；消遣；娱乐

word_family.mean: v. 使高兴；使喜欢；使满足；随自己的意；自己想干什么就干什么；讨人喜欢；满足心愿；给人美的愉悦；希望做某事；想做某事

examination_example.sentence: If there's anything else you need, <highlight>please</highlight> come see me in my office anytime.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你还需要什么，请随时来我办公室找我。

examination_example.sentence: So <highlight>please</highlight> tell us, why do decide to open a café?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以请告诉我们，为什么决定开一家咖啡馆？

examination_example.sentence: Could you <highlight>please</highlight> explain?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 能请你解释一下吗？

examination_example.sentence: Such children end up lonely, chronically dissatisfied and resentful of the parents who tried so hard to <highlight>please</highlight> them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样的孩子最终会感到孤独、长期不满，并对努力取悦他们的父母充满怨恨。

examination_example.sentence: After years of <highlight>pleasing</highlight> a fascinated audience across Europe, in 1699 she sailed nearly 5, 000 miles from the Netherlands to South America.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在取悦欧洲各地着迷的观众多年后，1699年她从荷兰航行了近5000英里到达南美洲。

sample.mean: adj. 使人快乐的；让人开心的；令人愉快的；让人满意的；讨人喜欢的；友好的；体贴的
n. 高兴；愉快；快乐；满足；乐趣；快感；乐事；惬意；消遣；娱乐

word_usage.usage: please多用在祈使句中，可放在句首，也可放在句末。放在句末时，please前多有逗号。如：请把门关上。Close the door, please. 或 Please close the door.

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Please</highlight> feel free to call me for any further questions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如有任何问题，请随时电话联系我。

examination_example.sentence: So if any of you have some free time during the weekend, <highlight>please</highlight> come join us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以如果你们在周末有空闲时间，请加入我们。

examination_example.sentence: There could be significant traffic delays, so <highlight>please</highlight> start to plan your journey now and consider if you really need to travel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可能会有长时间的交通延误，所以请现在就开始计划你的旅程，并考虑你是否真的需要出行。

examination_example.sentence: She is too eager to <highlight>please</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她太渴望取悦别人了。

examination_example.sentence: You're really difficult to <highlight>please</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你真的很难取悦。

examination_example.sentence: You don't have to take anyone else into consideration and can do whatever you <highlight>please</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你不必考虑其他任何人，你可以做任何你想做的事情。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Please</highlight> explain the meaning of the underlined word in Para.4.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请解释第4段中划线词的意思。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Please</highlight> decide which part is false in the following statement, then underline it and explain why.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请判断下列哪个部分是错误的，然后在下面划线并解释为什么。

examination_example.sentence: Hello, can I speak to Mr.Stone, <highlight>please</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 喂，我能和斯通先生讲话吗？

examination_example.sentence: This joyful show will <highlight>please</highlight> everyone, from the youngest to the oldest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这场令人愉悦的表演将取悦所有人，从最小的到最大的。

word_usage.usage:
主要用于祈使句和表示请求的句子，以示语气客气、委婉：
Please come in. 请进。
Could you please help me with my English? 请你帮我学英语好吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

examination_example.sentence: Wait a minute, <highlight>please</highlight>.

examination_example.sentence: Would you <highlight>please</highlight> give me some advice?

examination_example.sentence: Chaplin was known for being hard to <highlight>please</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 卓别林以难以取悦而闻名。
